About Me

I am Eol Nuha, and I am a full-stack software developer.

A Software Developer

As a highly skilled Frontend Developer at Gjirafa, I specialize in utilizing my problem-solving abilities and technical expertise to create innovative and efficient solutions. With a strong background in various programming languages, including Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Vue.JS, Java, and Groovy, I am well-equipped to tackle any challenge that arises. My passion for technology, combined with my independent, introverted nature, allows me to excel in a fast-paced and dynamic work environment. I am always seeking to expand my skill set and connect with other professionals in the software engineering field.

Experiences

Below are my job experiences as a software developer.

Frontend Developer

GjirafaTech (August 2022 - Present)

  • Lead frontend developer for a full-end-to-end video platform ecosystem, utilizing Vue.js, Vuex, HTML, CSS, SCSS, Apollo, and Axios to design and develop user-facing interfaces.
  • Collaborated with design and product teams to understand requirements and ensure the final product met needs. Integrated front end with various APIs and services to deliver high-quality products.
  • Implemented features such as video playback, user registration and login, and video comments, and improved platform performance and scalability. Contributed to the platform's successful launch and ongoing success.

Frontend Developer

WebOrigo (April 2022 - July 2022)

  • Implemented the design of countless web pages and developed modern mobile-first websites.
  • Communicated closely with clients to collect requirements and deliver quality projects.
  • Improved legacy code and maintain the overall quality of the codebase.

Full-stack Software Developer

Pythys Software (March 2021 - April 2022)

  • Conducted research on servers and was the leader of the team that developed a live-streaming website.
  • Collaborated with senior management, including the chief executive director, to create a sustainable system to serve all employees.
  • Developed the Menuz mobile app, a solution that allows restaurant diners to serve themselves. The app was developed with technologies including but not limited to Java, React Native, Javascript, and PostgreSQL.

Python Developer (Intern)

Starlabs Inc. (January 2021 - April 2021)

  • Designed and developed an educational platform for students in Kosovo.
  • Communicated with students of Kosovo to collect requirements for such a platform in their student lives.
  • Generated reports to conduct analysis and research on student needs of the platform that we developed.
